attributes.action: enter every employee that works over 100 hours, into a lottery to win a pair of plane tickets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WE WORK HARD

Often with not much reward....its pretty easy to rack up 100 hours at your desk, with about 2 full lunch breaks. 

Some people can't afford holidays. 

Wouldn't it be nice if Gordon Brown gave 10 lucky people a pair of plane tickets every month...paid for by our taxes. 

This is about well-being, and not feeling like being constantly taken for a ride by the goverment, that maybe our taxes are being used properly, not being lied to, getting us interested in individual politicians as real people rather than politics.

And a great way to get more people to get on the electoral roll.

It would keep us all sweet.

Think about it Gordon.
